notes.disclaimer: This is just a sample db.json not used by the code.
notes.one: Can be used to copy paste data for Postman; is currently a front end test database to speed development while API is still not functional.
notes.two: Also allows me to collect all of my MongoDB data in one preliminary place as I create content for the site.
notes.three: IDs and timestamps are placeholders to represent how it will work in back end. These will be auto-generated by API.
notes.four: Please run your servers at port 3443 to match baseUrl, which is configured for HTTPS server.
